import React, {useState, useEffect,useRef} from 'react'; import './Homepage.css'; import BIRDS from 'vanta/dist/vanta.birds.min'; export default function Home() { const zero = useRef(null); const first = useRef(null); const second = useRef(null); const third = useRef(null); const fourth = useRef(null); const scrollToElement = (event,id) => { console.log(first.current); const [vantaEffect, setVantaEffect] = useState(0) const myRef = useRef(null) useEffect(() => { if (!vantaEffect) { setVantaEffect(BIRDS({ el: myRef.current })) } return () => { if (vantaEffect) vantaEffect.destroy() } }, [vantaEffect]) return (
